html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-10632018-08-28,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectComposition of the Treasury Board
PrecisOrder (1) terminating the nominations made by Order in Council P.C. 2018-1028 of July 18, 2018; (2) nominating the Members of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada who, in addition to the President of the Treasury Board and the Minister of Finance, are to constitute the TREASURY BOARD (TB); (3) nominating the Members of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada to be alternates who may serve in their place; (4) declaring that three members of the TB constitute a quorum.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Composition of the Treasury Board
precis: Order (1) terminating the nominations made by Order in Council P.C. 2018-1028 of July 18, 2018; (2) nominating the Members of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada who, in addition to the President of the Treasury Board and the Minister of Finance, are to constitute the TREASURY BOARD (TB); (3) nominating the Members of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada to be alternates who may serve in their place; (4) declaring that three members of the TB constitute a quorum.
